name: Meet Me In The Parking Lot!
name_original: Meet Me In The Parking Lot!
description:
THE YEAR IS 2030.  YOU WAKE UP IN THE TRUNK OF A CAR ONLY TO GET OUT AND FIND THE WORLD HAD GONE INTO A FULL BLOWN APOCALYPSE.

YOU COULD TRY AND FIX THE SITUATION, BUT IT’D BE A LOT EASIER TO JUST FIND A BAR AND GRAB A DRINK!

TOO BAD SOME FOLKS WANNA START SHIT EVEN AS THE WORLD IS ENDING!

Fight your way through 10 Levels of random bars and parking lots worth of assholes that can’t just let you chill.  No kicks. No combos. Just good old fashioned, fist in your face mayhem.

+  +  +  +  +

BUTTONS:

A - Punch

B - More Punching

Start - Start/Pause Game

Directional

Left/Right - Walk left and right

Up/Down - Move up and down on ground

+  +  +  +  +

YOU HAVE 5 LIVES!  (NO, YOU CAN’T EARN MORE LIVES.)

YOU CAN TAKE 5 PUNCHES PER LIFE, BUT TRY NOT TO GET PUNCHED!

(WHAT ARE YOU? A CHUMP? NAH! SO DON’T ACT LIKE IT!)

YOU CAN GRAB BEERS AND MAYBE TAKE AN EXTRA PUNCH OR TWO, BUT

SOME OF THOSE BOTTLES ARE EMPTY. SO, DON’T PLAN AROUND THEM BEING

YOUR ONLY SAVING GRACE!
